content: On the other side, you’ll find a large open area where several Wolf Guais are seated in front of the final bell, as well as a hanged wolf on a nearby tree.

The content is as follows:
On the other side, you’ll find a large open area where several Wolf Guais are seated in front of the final bell, as well as a hanged wolf on a nearby tree.
